title: Thoughts on Fallout 4 from someone who hated FO3 and FO:NV
body:
It's actually pretty cool. The quests are much easier to follow, when you go into a random off the beaten path area it isn't just an empty area with nothing to do, there's at least a few enemies in there and some cool rewards for exploring. I just started crafting weapons and armors using upgraded perks for them and i've made some really useless pistols into essentially long range rifles that do good damage...(you get a particular type of ammo all the time in the game and not a lot of the other types of ammo, so that's why i made this pistol a rifle)

I've got a good 5 hours into it or so and am liking it, which is a nice surprise.
